property.name: footerLinksJson
property.label: Footer links (JSON)
property.description: JSON object with accessibilityLink, privacyLink, contactLink.

property.name: topMargin

property.description: When true, adds margin above the footer.

property.name: language
property.label: Language
property.description: The language for the footer: en or fr.

property.name: assetBasePath
property.label: Asset base path

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
